abilities.name: Swooping Dive
abilities.rule: Once per battle, you can target this unit with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

abilities.name: Strike from the Skies
abilities.rule: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Tarsis buckler
abilities.rule: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 4

wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 4

wargear_options: ■ Any number of models can each have their Venatari lance replaced with 1 kinetic destroyer and 1 tarsus buckler.
